description.value: This is the logical model of the patient's immunization entries in an immunization or vaccination record. The patient immunization record of several entries as modeled here.

short.value: A record of an immunization or vaccination
The business identifier(s) for the immunization entry

description.value: The business identifier(s) for the immunization entry - This is an optional attribute, used for example to track an entry throughout its lifecycle, or across vaults.

short.value: The status of this immunization record entry

description.value: The status of the immunization record entry - whether it is active, entered in error, etc.

short.value: The reason for the status e.g. entered in error because ...
The dateTime when the immunization has been recorded

definition.value: The date and/or time when the immunization will has been recorded

short.value: The patient-specific order or recommendation for the immunization

definition.value: The patient-specific order or recommendation for the immunization, for example a prescription or a request for immunization for a patient by a physician.

short.value: The vaccination plan or protocol (not patient-specific) that this immunization is fulfilling

definition.value: The vaccination plan or protocol (not patient-specific) that this immunization is fulfilling.

short.value: The type of immunization action - for example first dose or reinforcement.

definition.value: The type of immunization action - for example first dose or reinforcement.

short.value: The professional that registered the patient will

definition.value: The healthcare professional who takes responsibility for collecting content.

short.value: The professional that registered the patient will

definition.value: The healthcare professional who takes responsibility for collecting content.
The patient that has received the immunization.

short.value: The target of the immunization - the disease that the immunization action is protecting against - e.g. Polio, Tetanus, HPV

definition.value: The target of the immunization - the disease that the immunization action is protecting against. This should be a coded value.

short.value: The evidence used to support the patient will.

definition.value: Supporting evidence for the patient will (e.g. a paper signed by the patient to refuse a specific treatment)

short.value: The details of the product that was administered.
The actual product that was administered.
The expiration date of the product.

definition.value: The expiration date of the product.

short.value: The evidence used to support the patient will.

definition.value: Supporting evidence for the patient will (e.g. a paper signed by the patient to refuse a specific treatment)
